title: trouble logging on
body: anyone else having the login screen for ages before you actually get to league?

replies.body: Nope, everything seems okay right now with authentication services.  There could be a snag with your network trying to reach out if it's taking so long.  Try out the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help clear up some blocks and get into the client.  I hope that helps!
